content: कलापः {@--1@} A band, bundle; मुक्ताकलापस्य च निस्तलस्य <ls>Ku. 1. 42</ls> a round necklace of pearls; रशनाकलापः a zone of several strings. {@--2@} A group or whole collection of things; अखिलकलाकलापालोचन <ls>K. 7.</ls> {@--3@} A peacock's tail; तं मे जातकलापं प्रेषय मणिकंठकं शिखिनं <ls>V. 5. 13</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 80</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 16</ls>, <ls n="Rs.">2. 14.</ls> {@--4@} A woman's zone or girdle; (<ab>oft.</ab> with कांची or रशना &c.); <ls>Bh. 1. 57</ls>, <ls n="Bh. 1.">67</ls>; <ls>Rs. 3. 20</ls>; <ls>Mk. 1. 27.</ls> {@--5@} An ornament in general. {@--6@} The rope round an elephant's neck. {@--7@} A quiver. {@--8@} An arrow. {@--9@} The moon. {@--10@} A shrewd and intelligent man. {@--11@} A poem written in one metre. {@--12@} A tuft (जटा°) or knot of braided hair. --पी A bundle of grass.
